Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 24th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2013...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Cincinnati on 7/28/2015 (Going to CIN: 1B N. Janousek, CF S. Victorino. Going to LAN: 1B C. Cron)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2018, off Aroldis Chapman (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2018, off Oscar Villarreal (MIL)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 5/9/2018...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2018, hitting .308 with 30 HR, 120 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/29/2019, hitting .522 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Washington on 9/25/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 9/22/2020...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...

Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
